name: Google fonts
description: Google Fonts offers a vast, free library of web‑optimized fonts for designers and developers.

name: Fontsource
description: Fontsource provides self‑hosted, open‑source fonts for modern web projects with easy integration.

name: Typewolf
description: Typewolf is a curated resource for trending typography and font inspiration across various projects.

name: Typo/graphic
description: Typo/graphic showcases creative typographic posters and design inspiration for typography enthusiasts.

name: Fontshare
description: Fontshare offers a collection of free, high‑quality fonts designed for modern web and graphic projects.

name: Fontpair
description: Fontpair helps you effortlessly find and experiment with perfect font pairings for your designs.

name: Free Faces
description: Free Faces features a curated gallery of free typefaces to spark creativity in your design work.

name: Font Meme
description: Font Meme is a fun resource to explore, generate, and share creative font-based graphics.

name: Fontjoy
description: Fontjoy is an interactive tool that generates harmonious font pairings to enhance your designs.

name: Font style matcher
description: Font style matcher analyzes fonts and suggests similar styles to help you refine your typography choices.

name: Fonts In Use
description: Fonts In Use showcases real‑world examples of fonts in design, providing inspiration and case studies.

name: Fluid typography
description: Fluid typography is a tool that helps create responsive, scalable type for modern web design.

name: DaFont
description: DaFont offers a huge collection of free fonts for personal and commercial design projects.

name: OnlineWebFonts.COM
description: OnlineWebFonts.COM provides an extensive catalog of web fonts available for download.

name: UNCUT.wtf
description: UNCUT.wtf is a quirky resource featuring a collection of unique and experimental fonts.

name: Beautiful web type
description: Beautiful web type curates inspiring examples of web typography and modern font usage.

name: Font Brief
description: Font Brief provides quick insights and live previews for a wide variety of fonts.

name: Font Pairings
description: Font Pairings helps designers discover and experiment with complementary font combinations.

name: Fonts in the Wild
description: Fonts in the Wild showcases free fonts used in real‑world projects for practical design inspiration.

name: Archetype
description: Archetype is an innovative tool to explore and test different font styles and pairings.

name: Typescale
description: Typescale is a plugin that assists in creating harmonious, responsive typographic scales.

name: Font.Download
description: Font.Download offers a simple interface to browse and download a variety of free fonts.

name: Modern Font Stacks
description: Modern Font Stacks offers a curated collection of modern CSS font stack recommendations.

name: Typefaces.today
description: Typefaces.today is a resource for discovering trending fonts and typographic inspiration.
